title: Jean Gilbert Bayaram
text: Jean Gilbert Bayaram (born July 7, 1974) is a <a href="Mauritian">Mauritian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="Pamplemousses%20SC">Pamplemousses SC</a> in the <a href="Mauritian%20League">Mauritian Premier League</a> and for the <a href="Mauritius%20national%20football%20team">Mauritius national football team</a> as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He is featured on the Mauritian national team in the official <a href="2010%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20South%20Africa%20%28video%20game%29">2010 FIFA World Cup video game</a>.
